TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ApplicationBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供与当前应用程序相关的属性、方法和事件。

span.span: Provides properties, methods, and events related to the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开的属性`My.Application`对象仅与当前应用程序或 DLL 相关联的返回数据。The properties exposed by the `My.Application` object return data that is associated only with the current application or DLL. 无法使用 `My.Application` 更改任何系统级信息。No system-level information can be altered with `My.Application`. `My.Application` 对象由以下类组成：The `My.Application` object consists of the following classes: - 提供了所有项目中的可用成员。 provides members that are available in all projects. - 提供 Windows 窗体应用程序中可用的成员。 provides members that are available in Windows Forms applications. - 提供控制台应用程序中可用的成员。 provides members that are available in console applications. ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable`方法以获取并显示路径环境变量的值，如果此值为可用。This example uses the `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable` method to get and display the value of the PATH environment variable, if this value is available. 否则，将显示一条消息，指示的 PATH 环境变量不存在。Otherwise, it displays a message that indicates that the PATH environment variable does not exist. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void ChangeCulture(string cultureName) cil managed

param.name: cultureName
param.span: 字符串形式的区域性名称。

span.span: Name of the culture as a string.

param.span: 有关可能名称的列表，请参见 。

span.span: For a list of possible names, see .

summary.span: 更改当前线程用于字符串操作和字符串格式设置的区域性。

span.span: Changes the culture used by the current thread for string manipulation and for string formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.ChangeCulture`方法更改当前线程的属性。The `My.Application.ChangeCulture` method changes the current thread's property. 为日期、 时间、 货币、 数字、 文本、 字符串比较和用于该线程上的所有计算的大小写的排序顺序确定的默认格式。 determines the default formats for dates, times, currency, numbers, sorting order of text, string comparisons, and casing for all computations on that thread. 若要检索的当前区域性，可以使用属性或属性。To retrieve the current culture, you can use the property or the property. 设置是不同的语言设置。The setting is different from a language setting. 它包含仅与地理区域的标准设置相关的数据。It contains only data related to the standard settings for a geographical region. 因此，到特定区域性或，才可以设置属性。Therefore, the property can only be set to a specific culture or to the . 使用`My.Application.ChangeUICulture`方法可以更改用于检索特定于区域性的资源使用当前线程的区域性。Use the `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` method to change the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources. > [!IMPORTANT] > `My.Application.ChangeCulture`方法需要与设置。The `My.Application.ChangeCulture` method requires a with the set. 由于与线程关联的安全状态，对线程进行操作很危险。Manipulating threads is dangerous because of the security state associated with threads. 因此，应仅对可信的代码根据需要授予此权限。Therefore, this permission should be given only as necessary to trustworthy code. 无法更改在不完全受信任的代码中的线程的区域性。You cannot change a thread's culture in semi-trusted code. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例演示如何更改区域性更改的字符串表示形式日期。This example demonstrates how changing the culture changes the string representation of dates. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

exception.span: 不是有效的区域性名称。

span.span: is not a valid culture name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void ChangeUICulture(string cultureName) cil managed

param.name: cultureName
param.span: 字符串形式的区域性名称。

span.span: Name of the culture as a string.

param.span: 有关可能名称的列表，请参见 。

span.span: For a list of possible names, see .

summary.span: 更改当前线程用来检索特定于区域性的资源的区域性。

span.span: Changes the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.ChangeUICulture`方法更改当前线程的属性。The `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` method changes the current thread's property. 属性确定的资源管理器使用的区域性和`My.Resources`对象; 它将使用此信息以在运行时查找查找区域性特定资源。The property determines the culture used by the Resource Manager and the `My.Resources` object; it uses this information to look up culture-specific resources at run time. 若要检索的当前 UI 区域性，可以使用属性或属性。To retrieve the current UI culture, you can use the property or the property. 使用`My.Application.ChangeCulture`方法可以更改当前线程使用的字符串操作函数和字符串格式设置的区域性。Use the `My.Application.ChangeCulture` method to change the culture that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.ChangeUICulture`方法将区域性设置`My.Resources`对象将用于检索资源。This example uses the `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` method to set the culture that the `My.Resources` object uses for retrieving resources. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyResources#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyResources/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 为此示例正常工作，你的应用程序必须具有名为字符串`Message`在应用程序的资源文件和应用程序应具有的资源文件，法语区域性版本`Resources.fr-FR.resx`。For this example to work, your application must have a string named `Message` in the application's resource file, and the application should have the French-culture version of that resource file, `Resources.fr-FR.resx`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 添加或删除资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d). 如果应用程序不具有的资源文件，法语区域性版本`My.Resources`对象将从默认区域性资源文件中检索资源。If the application does not have the French-culture version of that resource file, the `My.Resources` object retrieves the resource from the default-culture resource file.

span.span: is .

exception.span: 不是有效的区域性名称。

span.span: is not a valid culture name.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Culture As CultureInfo
public: property System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ Culture { System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前线程用于字符串操作和字符串格式设置的区域性。

span.span: Gets the culture that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting.

value.span: 一个 对象，它表示当前线程用于字符串操作和字符串格式设置的区域性。

span.span: A object that represents the culture the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.CurrentCulture`属性可以获取当前线程使用的字符串操作函数和字符串格式设置的对象。The `My.Application.CurrentCulture` property gets the object that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting. 此对象在等同于由代码属性，用于控制许多字符串相关的计算该线程上。This object is identical to the one returned by the property, which controls many of the string-related computations on that thread. 属性确定的默认格式的日期、 时间、 货币和数字。The property determines the default formats for dates, times, currency, and numbers. 它还确定如何排序、 比较和利用字符串。It also determines how to sort, compare, and capitalize strings. 若要更改的区域性，可以使用方法或分配一个不同对象传递给属性。To change the culture, you can use the method or assign a different object to the property. 设置是不同的语言设置。The setting is different from a language setting. 它包含仅与地理区域的标准设置相关的数据。It contains only data related to the standard settings for a geographical region. 使用`My.Application.CurrentUICulture`要获取当前线程使用来检索区域性特定资源的区域性属性。Use the `My.Application.CurrentUICulture` property to get the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例演示区域性如何影响日期的字符串表示。This example demonstrates how the culture affects the string representation of dates. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance string GetEnvironmentVariable(string name) cil managed
Public Function GetEnvironmentVariable (name As String) As String

span.span: A containing the name of the environment variable.

summary.span: 返回指定环境变量的值。

span.span: Returns the value of the specified environment variable.

returns.span: 一个 ，包含名为 的环境变量的值。

span.span: A containing the value of the environment variable with the name .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable`方法返回具有名称的环境变量`name`。The `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable` method returns the environment variable with the name `name`. 此方法类似于是，只不过此方法会引发异常，如果指定环境变量按`name`不存在。This method is similar to , except that this method raises an exception if the environment variable specified by `name` does not exist. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable`方法以获取并显示路径环境变量的值，如果可用。This example uses the `My.Application.GetEnvironmentVariable` method to get and display the value of the PATH environment variable, if available. 否则，将显示一条消息指出的 PATH 环境变量不存在。Otherwise, it displays a message indicating that the PATH environment variable does not exist. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#7)]

span.span: is .

exception.span: 指定的环境变量不存在。

exception.span: 调用代码没有访问权限为 的 。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Info As AssemblyInfo

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象提供用来获取有关应用程序的程序集的信息（如版本号、说明等等）的属性。

span.span: Gets an object that provides properties for getting information about the application's assembly, such as the version number, description, and so on.

value.span: 当前应用程序的 对象。

span.span: The object for the current application.

remarks.format: ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.Info.Version`属性来显示应用程序的版本。This example uses the `My.Application.Info.Version` property to display the version of the application. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Log As Log
public: property Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::Log ^ Log { Microsoft::VisualBasic::Logging::Log ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象提供用来将事件和异常信息写入应用程序的日志侦听器的属性和方法。

span.span: Gets an object that provides properties and methods for writing event and exception information to the application's log listeners.

value.span: 当前应用程序的 对象。

span.span: The object for the current application.

remarks.format: ## Examples 本示例将演示如何使用 `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` 方法来记录跟踪信息。This example shows how to use the `My.Application.Log.WriteEntry` method to log tracing information. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 编写日志消息](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md)。For more information, see [How to: Write Log Messages](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-write-log-messages.md). [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplicationLog#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplicationLog/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UICulture As CultureInfo
public: property System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ UICulture { System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前线程用来检索特定于区域性的资源的区域性。

span.span: Gets the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.

value.span: 一个 对象，它表示当前线程用来检索特定于区域性的资源的区域性。

span.span: A object that represents the culture that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.CurrentUICulture`属性可以获取对象当前线程，使用用于检索特定于区域性的资源。The `My.Application.CurrentUICulture` property gets the object that the current thread uses for retrieving culture-specific resources. 此对象在等同于由代码属性。This object is identical to the one returned by the property. 属性确定的资源管理器使用的区域性和`My.Resources`对象，它需要在运行时查找查找区域性特定资源的信息。The property determines the culture used by the Resource Manager and the `My.Resources` object, information it needs to look up culture-specific resources at run time. 若要更改的区域性，可以使用方法或分配一个不同对象传递给属性。To change the culture, you can use the method or assign a different object to the property. 设置是不同的语言设置。The setting is different from a language setting. 它包含仅与地理区域的标准设置相关的数据。It contains only data related to the standard settings for a geographical region. 使用`My.Application.CurrentCulture`要获取当前线程使用的字符串操作函数和字符串格式设置的区域性属性。Use the `My.Application.CurrentCulture` property to get the culture that the current thread uses for string manipulation and string formatting. ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Application.CurrentCulture`属性，然后再更改通过使用缓存的当前区域性。This example uses the `My.Application.CurrentCulture` property to cache the current culture before changing it by using . `My.Application.ChangeUICulture`方法设置的区域性`My.Resources`对象将用于检索资源。The `My.Application.ChangeUICulture` method sets the culture that the `My.Resources` object uses for retrieving resources. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyResources#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyResources/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 为此示例正常工作，你的应用程序必须具有名为字符串`Message`在应用程序的资源文件和应用程序应具有的资源文件，法语区域性版本`Resources.fr-FR.resx`。For this example to work, your application must have a string named `Message` in the application's resource file, and the application should have the French-culture version of that resource file, `Resources.fr-FR.resx`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 添加或删除资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d). 如果应用程序不具有的资源文件，法语区域性版本`My.Resources`对象将从默认区域性资源文件中检索资源。If the application does not have the French-culture version of that resource file, the `My.Resources` object retrieves the resource from the default-culture resource file.
